thread.title: Vizio settles for $2.2 million in FTC suit over snooping on consumers’ viewing habits
thread.title_full: Vizio settles for $2.2 million in FTC suit over snooping on consumers’ viewing habits

author: Pollyanna
title: Vizio settles for $2.2 million in FTC suit over snooping on consumers’ viewing habits
text:
By Devin Coldewey 
TV maker Vizio will pay $2.2 million to settle a lawsuit after it was shown that for years the company has been secretly collecting viewing data and selling it to third parties. The penalty may seem light, but the damage to the Vizio brand may be irreparable. Read More 
Read more here:: techcrunch.com – gadgets Rate this post
